stripped_text: Whenever you score an agenda, look at the top 3 cards of R&D. You may install 1 non-agenda card from among them. Whenever an agenda is stolen, you may install 1 non-agenda card from HQ.
stripped_title: Poetri Luxury Brands: All the Rage
text:
Whenever you score an agenda, look at the top 3 cards of R&D. You may install 1 non-agenda card from among them.
Whenever an agenda is stolen, you may install 1 non-agenda card from HQ.
title: Poétrï Luxury Brands: All the Rage
